general.incidentPrologue:

general.autoSolvedReplyMessage:
Even if the problem is solved automatically, creation of an incident is mandatory according to the setting.
Therefore the system is creating an incident.

general.msgNoAutoSolvedIncidentCreate: Automatically solved incident is not created in the current setting.
